title: Toyland revolt
creator_credit: H Tyrlova, T.R. Sadek, J Novotny and Czechoslovakia Film Corporation, Documentary Film Department, Section Zlin
brief_description: A combination of live actors and animated puppets tell the story of the revolt of the toys when an S.S. man invades a toymaker’s shop and forces the old man to flee. The toys unite in their struggle to defeat the evils of Nazism. Cast: Edvard Linkers and Jindra Laznicka.
